original_title: Keselwatta Killing: Cops Arrest Four Men in Alleged Revenge Attack
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Four individuals from Keselwatta, Colombo, have been apprehended by the Colombo Crime Division in connection with the December 30th slaying of a local resident.
Initial investigations suggest the killing may have been a reprisal for the victim providing information about a drug dealer to the police.
Authorities confirmed that all four arrested individuals reside in the Keselwatta area.
